content.text:
# November 2025 United Kingdom budget

The November 2025 United Kingdom budget is expected to be delivered to the House of Commons by Rachel Reeves, the chancellor of the exchequer, on 26 November 2025.
Background
In an interview with Sky News' political editor Beth Rigby on 22 November 2025 at the 2025 G20 Johannesburg summit, Keir Starmer refused to rule out implementing manifesto-breaking tax hikes in the budget.
